title: Every Scripter I put in my Scripter list got banned
body:
and when I made a video outting someone who was scripting most people on these forums just said I was bad and that's why I missed every skillshot.

Anyone want a how to on spotting scripters?

[EDIT] P.S Thanks based Riot.

replies.body: I'd probably make a short n' sweet video if enough people were interested. If it's only a few I'll just post a few tips in this thread.
Include me as the tie breaker for "enough"

how to spot scripters

-they play xerath and cassio
There are scripts for every champion in the game, and yes I don't just mean "using dodge script on ww". There's actual scripts that play Ww for you at maximum efficiency. Hard to believe as that is.

Played with a guy named "Barnoss" when in champ select said "mid please im good" then "check my stats".

Checked his stats, been playing cass, xerath, syndra. Worth reporting? His cockiness in champ select seemed strange and he was going to pick xerath no matter what. I suspect scripts. Tell me what you think
mm, I'll make a vid to spot what scripters do in game, don't report based on champ but those champs are very suspect.

The beauty of lists.

Am I right?
